title: PALLBEARER Announces US Tour Dates With CINDER WELL
description: Happening this May and June. The post PALLBEARER Announces US Tour Dates With CINDER WELL appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 5 hours ago
text: Pallbearer has a bunch of brand new US tour dates coming up with Cinder Well as support. The dates follow a trio in St. Louis, Indianapolis, and Chicago as a solo act. Get your tickets here. "Greetings everyone – we're announcing more US dates in May and June, and we'll be forging a pathway through a number of places we missed on last year’s Temporary Spaces tour," wrote Pallbearer of the trek. "From May 26 through June 7 we are privileged to share the stage once more with the unparalleled Cinder Well. Tickets on sale tomorrow at 10am local." 5/2 St Louis, MO Off Broadway (no Cinder Well)5/3 Indianapolis, IN Black Circle (no Cinder Well)5/4 Chicago, IL Reggies (no Cinder Well)5/26 Columbus, OH Ace of Cups5/27 Cleveland, OH Mahall's5/28 Detroit, MI El Club5/30 Lancaster, PA Tellus 3605/31 Pittsburgh, PA Mr Smalls6/1 Brooklyn, NY The Meadows6/3 Baltimore, MD Metro6/4 Richmond, VA The Broadberry6/5 Greenville, SC The Radio Room6/6 Nashville, TN The End6/7 Little Rock, AR Mutants of the Monster Want More Metal? html:
Pallbearer has a bunch of brand new US tour dates coming up with Cinder Well as support. The dates follow a trio in St. Louis, Indianapolis, and Chicago as a solo act. Get your tickets here.

"Greetings everyone – we're announcing more US dates in May and June, and we'll be forging a pathway through a number of places we missed on last year’s Temporary Spaces tour," wrote Pallbearer of the trek. "From May 26 through June 7 we are privileged to share the stage once more with the unparalleled Cinder Well. Tickets on sale tomorrow at 10am local."

5/2 St Louis, MO Off Broadway (no Cinder Well)
5/3 Indianapolis, IN Black Circle (no Cinder Well)
5/4 Chicago, IL Reggies (no Cinder Well)
5/26 Columbus, OH Ace of Cups
5/27 Cleveland, OH Mahall's
5/28 Detroit, MI El Club
5/30 Lancaster, PA Tellus 360
5/31 Pittsburgh, PA Mr Smalls

6/3 Baltimore, MD Metro

6/7 Little Rock, AR Mutants of the Monster
